contentType:
<type>
  <name>AllTypes</name>
  <module>myModule</module>
  <qualifiedName>myModule:AllTypes</qualifiedName>
  <displayName>All the Types</displayName>
  <superType>System:Content</superType>
  <isAbstract>false</isAbstract>
  <isFinal>true</isFinal>
  <items>
    <input type="Color" built-in="true" name="myColor">
      <label/>
      <immutable>false</immutable>
      <indexed>false</indexed>
      <customText/>
      <helpText/>
      <occurrences minimum="0" maximum="1"/>
    </input>
    <input type="Date" built-in="true" name="myDate">
      <label/>
      <immutable>false</immutable>
      <indexed>false</indexed>
      <customText/>
      <helpText/>
      <occurrences minimum="0" maximum="1"/>
    </input>
    <input type="DecimalNumber" built-in="true" name="myDecimalNumber">
      <label/>
      <immutable>false</immutable>
      <indexed>false</indexed>
      <customText/>
      <helpText/>
      <occurrences minimum="0" maximum="1"/>
    </input>
    <input type="GeoLocation" built-in="true" name="myGeoLocation">
      <label/>
      <immutable>false</immutable>
      <indexed>false</indexed>
      <customText/>
      <helpText/>
      <occurrences minimum="0" maximum="1"/>
    </input>
    <input type="HtmlArea" built-in="true" name="myHtmlArea">
      <label/>
      <immutable>false</immutable>
      <indexed>false</indexed>
      <customText/>
      <helpText/>
      <occurrences minimum="0" maximum="1"/>
    </input>
    <input type="Money" built-in="true" name="myMoney">
      <label/>
      <immutable>false</immutable>
      <indexed>false</indexed>
      <customText/>
      <helpText/>
      <occurrences minimum="0" maximum="1"/>
    </input>
    <input type="Phone" built-in="true" name="myPhone">
      <label/>
      <immutable>false</immutable>
      <indexed>false</indexed>
      <customText/>
      <helpText/>
      <occurrences minimum="0" maximum="1"/>
    </input>
    <input type="SingleSelector" built-in="true" name="mySingleSelector">
      <label/>
      <immutable>false</immutable>
      <indexed>false</indexed>
      <customText/>
      <helpText/>
      <occurrences minimum="0" maximum="1"/>
      <config name="com.enonic.wem.api.content.type.form.inputtype.SingleSelectorConfig">
        <options>
          <option>
            <label>myOption 1</label>
            <value>o1</value>
          </option>
          <option>
            <label>myOption 2</label>
            <value>o2</value>
          </option>
        </options>
        <selector-type>DROPDOWN</selector-type>
      </config>
    </input>
    <input type="Tags" built-in="true" name="myTags">
      <label/>
      <immutable>false</immutable>
      <indexed>false</indexed>
      <customText/>
      <helpText/>
      <occurrences minimum="0" maximum="1"/>
    </input>
    <input type="TextLine" built-in="true" name="myTextLine">
      <label/>
      <immutable>false</immutable>
      <indexed>false</indexed>
      <customText/>
      <helpText/>
      <occurrences minimum="0" maximum="1"/>
    </input>
    <input type="TextArea" built-in="true" name="myTextArea">
      <label/>
      <immutable>false</immutable>
      <indexed>false</indexed>
      <customText/>
      <helpText/>
      <occurrences minimum="0" maximum="1"/>
    </input>
    <input type="WholeNumber" built-in="true" name="myWholeNumber">
      <label/>
      <immutable>false</immutable>
      <indexed>false</indexed>
      <customText/>
      <helpText/>
      <occurrences minimum="0" maximum="1"/>
    </input>
    <input type="Xml" built-in="true" name="myXml">
      <label/>
      <immutable>false</immutable>
      <indexed>false</indexed>
      <customText/>
      <helpText/>
      <occurrences minimum="0" maximum="1"/>
    </input>
  </items>
</type>
